Function.DocText: Base_Var_File_Loop_To_Create : use this var to set the loop file to create Base_Var_File_Loop_Size_To_Create : Use this var to set the size of the lopp file to create Base usage : Base_Var_File_Loop_To_Create="My_device_file" ( full path ) Base_Var_File_Loop_Size_To_Create="My_size" (for 100 mo = 100 autodoc.ksh chroot_installer.ksh env_installer.ksh firewall.ksh fs_creator.ksh globalbuild.ksh ksh main_menu.ksh main_template.ksh sanity_check.ksh 1000 = 100000 ) Device_loop_Create
